headline: Keeper Tax job ad is how job ads should be
description:
Link here: https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/keeper-tax/jobs/skoGD7B-data-engineer

I like that it shows what to expect from the interview process and doesn’t go into too many superlatives about what the Data Engineer will be doing. The salary and equity bands are also listed. It’s a very well done and clean job ad.
headline_zh-Hans: 税务局的招聘广告是招聘广告应该有的样子
headline_zh-Hant: 稅務局的招聘廣告是招聘廣告應該有的樣子
description_zh-Hans:
链接在此：https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/keeper-tax/jobs/skoGD7B-data-engineer

我喜欢它显示了面试过程中的预期，并没有过多地介绍数据工程师将做什么的超级描述。还列出了工资和公平等级。这是一个非常好的、干净的招聘广告。
description_zh-Hant:
鏈接在此：https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/keeper-tax/jobs/skoGD7B-data-engineer

我喜歡它顯示了面試過程中的預期，並沒有過多地介紹數據工程師將做什麼的超級描述。還列出了工資和公平等級。這是一個非常好的、乾淨的招聘廣告。
